definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: specialists but no philosophers of human wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 只有专门家，而没有人类知识的哲学家。

sentences.english: Our specialists in music should pay attention to the songs of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 我们的音乐专门家应该注意群众的歌唱。

sentences.english: Our specialists in drama should pay attention to the small troupes in the army and the villages.
sentences.chinese: 我们的戏剧专门家应该注意军队和农村中的小剧团。

sentences.english: Our specialists in the fine arts should pay attention to the fine arts of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 我们的美术专门家应该注大众的美术。

definition: to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)

pinyin: gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3

definition: to dig into piles of outdated writings (idiom); to study old books and papers
